title: Edge of Forever
description: After suffering an unexpected and devastating loss, I return to my job with the FBI and focus on finding the answers I need. Now, forced to live without the person I've come to love the most, I feel more alone than ever.And if missing Belfast and trying to navigate my life without him isn't difficult enough, every direction I turn danger lurks--waiting for me.No longer able to tell friend from foe, everyone is a suspect.But I won't stop until the person responsible pays.
author: Jacob Chance
